item.title: Text Messaging To The Stars
item.description: Instead of texting Hollywood stars, how about sending a message to another planet? You can join a project called “Hello From Earth,” which sent text messages to Gliese 581d, a planet outside our solar system. Located 20 light years away in the constellation Libra, it will take about 20 years for your message to reach these potential extraterrestrials. While we don’t know who or what might receive our messages, many people chose to send greetings of peace.
